docs.snippet: Mr. Trump, knowingly or not, joined a long line of people who have justified harsh policies against a group by portraying its members, often in sexualized terms, as perilous to women....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump, knowingly or not, joined a long line of people who have justified harsh policies against a group by portraying its members, often in sexualized terms, as perilous to women.
docs.abstract: Amanda Taub The Interpreter column argues that when Donald Trump vilifies male Muslim immigrants as threat to women, he is part of tradition of propagandists who use women as pawns; argues history proves such tactics effective in rallying people behind messenger and against outsiders rather than actually protecting women.

headline.main: Portraying Muslims as a Threat to Women, Donald Trump Echoes ‘Us vs. Them’ Refrain
headline.print_headline: A Reach for Power With ‘Us vs. Them’

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump says he will end the H-1B program, which allows certain skilled immigrants to work in the United States — including some employees of Trump Model Management....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump says he will end the H-1B program, which allows certain skilled immigrants to work in the United States — including some employees of Trump Model Management.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump pledges to end controversial H-1B visa program without exceptions, despite fact his own companies, including Trump Modeling Management, have used program to bring hundreds of foreign workers into United States for years.

headline.main: Donald Trump Wants to Cut Visa Program He Used for His Own Models
headline.print_headline: Trump Wants to Cut Visas He Used for His Own Models

byline.contributor: Jeremy Bowers contributed reporting from Washington, and Maggie Haberman from New York.
